enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog disabled in chip stop mode.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog enabled in chip stop mode.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog disabled in chip wait mode.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog enabled in chip wait mode.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog disabled in chip debug mode.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog enabled in chip debug mode.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog test mode disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog user mode enabled. (Watchdog test mode disabled.) After testing the watchdog, software should use this setting to indicate that the watchdog is functioning normally in user mode.

enumeratedValues.name: EN_LOW
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog test mode enabled, only the low byte is used. CNT[CNTLOW] is compared with TOVAL[TOVALLOW].

enumeratedValues.name: EN_HIGH
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog test mode enabled, only the high byte is used. CNT[CNTHIGH] is compared with TOVAL[TOVALHIGH].

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Updates not allowed. After the initial configuration, the watchdog cannot be later modified without forcing a reset.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Updates allowed. Software can modify the watchdog configuration registers within 128 bus clocks after performing the unlock write sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog interrupts are disabled. Watchdog resets are not delayed.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog interrupts are enabled. Watchdog resets are delayed by 128 bus clocks from the interrupt vector fetch.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Watchdog enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: RECONFIG
enumeratedValues.description: Reconfiguring WDOG.

enumeratedValues.name: SUCCESS
enumeratedValues.description: Reconfiguration is successful.

enumeratedValues.name: LOCK
enumeratedValues.description: WDOG is locked.

enumeratedValues.name: UNLOCK
enumeratedValues.description: WDOG is unlocked.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: 256 prescaler disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: 256 prescaler enabled.

CMD32EN.name: CMD32EN
CMD32EN.description: Enables or disables WDOG support for 32-bit (otherwise 16-bit or 8-bit) refresh/unlock command write words

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Disables support for 32-bit refresh/unlock command write words. Only 16-bit or 8-bit is supported.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Enables support for 32-bit refresh/unlock command write words. 16-bit or 8-bit is NOT supported.

enumeratedValues.name: NO
enumeratedValues.description: No interrupt occurred.

enumeratedValues.name: YES
enumeratedValues.description: An interrupt occurred.

enumeratedValues.name: DIS
enumeratedValues.description: Window mode disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: EN
enumeratedValues.description: Window mode enabled.

CNTLOW.name: CNTLOW
CNTLOW.description: Low byte of the Watchdog Counter

CNTHIGH.name: CNTHIGH
CNTHIGH.description: High byte of the Watchdog Counter

TOVALLOW.name: TOVALLOW
TOVALLOW.description: Low byte of the timeout value

TOVALHIGH.name: TOVALHIGH
TOVALHIGH.description: High byte of the timeout value
